[Unique - only 1 per champion]
56_desc: Grants %i:scaleArmor% @ArmorPerEnemy@ Armor and %i:scaleMR% @MRPerEnemy@ Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

Negates @CritReduction*100@% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@/@2StarAoEDamage@/@3StarAoEDamage@ %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every @ICD@ seconds).

[Direct damage item]
9008_desc:
Combat start: The farthest enemy is pulled into melee range and Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities
9003_desc:
Enemies who damage the holder are @AttackSpeedSlowPercent@% Chilled for @SlowDuration@ seconds. After @NumApplications@ Chills from this item, the attacker is Stunned instead, but only once every @FreezeCooldown@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Chill: reduce Attack Speed
Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

9020_desc:

Once per combat at @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain a @ShieldHealthPercent@% maximum Health shield that lasts up to @ShieldDuration@ seconds. While the shield is active, the holder gains @BonusShieldAD*100@% Attack Damage.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.
Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
RabadonsDeathcap_desc: <tftitemrules>This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.</tftitemrules>
InfinityEdge_desc: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.
5TrapClawRadiant_desc: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@DamageAmpPct@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> more damage for @Duration@ seconds.
5IonicSparkRadiant_desc:
@MRShred@% Shred enemies within @HexRange@ hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of their maximum Mana.

Also, regenerate @MaxHealthRegen@% maximum Health per second.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
5QuicksilverRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
5HextechGunbladeRadiant_desc:
Grant @OmniVamp@% Omnivamp, which also heals the lowest percent Health ally.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
5StatikkShivRadiant_desc:
Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to @1StarBounces@ enemies, dealing @Damage@ magic damage and @MRShred@% Shredding them for @MRShredDuration@ seconds.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
5FrozenHeartRadiant_desc: Once per combat: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain %i:scaleArmor% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@Stats@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Armor and %i:scaleMR% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@Stats@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Magic Resist for the rest of combat, and a <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@ShieldHealthPercent@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> maximum Health shield that lasts up to @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
5BlueBuffRadiant_desc:
Abilities cost %i:scaleMana% @ManaReduction@ less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within @TakedownTimer@ seconds of casting, gain %i:scaleMana% @ManaOnTakedown@ Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
5ArchangelsStaffRadiant_desc: Combat start: Gain %i:scaleAP% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@APPerInterval@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Ability Power every <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@IntervalSeconds@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> seconds.
5MorellonomiconRadiant_desc:
Magic or true damage from the holder's Ability @BurnPercent@% Burns and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wounds enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received
5BrambleVestRadiant_desc:
Negates all bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@/@2StarAoEDamage@/@3StarAoEDamage@ %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every @ICD@ seconds).

[Direct damage item]
5ZzRotPortalRadiant_desc:
Combat start: A Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage arises and Taunts nearby enemies.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
5ShroudOfStillnessRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Shoot a wider beam that @CostIncrease@% Mana Reaves enemies.
Your team gains %i:scaleMana% @AllyBonusMana@ starting Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast
5RunaansHurricaneRadiant_desc:
Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing @MultiplierForDamage@% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.

​​[Direct damage item]
5ZephyrRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for @BanishDuration@ seconds.
Your team gains %i:scaleAS% @AllyBonusAS@% Attack Speed.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]
5GuinsoosRagebladeRadiant_desc: Attacks grant %i:scaleAS% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@AttackSpeedPerStack@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.
5HandOfJusticeRadiant_desc:
Grant 2 effects:
  • %i:scaleAD% @ADBuff*100@% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% @APBuff@ Ability Power.
  • @TraitMultiplier@% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
5SunfireCapeRadiant_desc:
Every @ICD@ seconds, an enemy within @HexRange@ hexes is @BurnPercent@% Burned and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wounded for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received
5ZekesHeraldRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleAS% @AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed and @Lifesteal@% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Aura item]
Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
5LastWhisperRadiant_desc:
Any physical damage dealt @ArmorReductionPercent@% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only one per champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor
5LocketOfTheIronSolariRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Shields the holder and allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row for @1StarShieldValue@/@2StarShieldValue@/@3StarShieldValue@ %i:star% damage for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
Your team gains %i:scaleHealth% @BonusAllyHealth@ Health.

​​[Aura item]
5ThiefsGlovesRadiant_desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]
5RedemptionRadiant_desc:
Heal allies within @HexRadius@ hexes for @MissingHealthHeal@% of their missing Health every @HealTickRate@ seconds. They take @AoEDamageReduction@% less multi-target damage for @HealTickRate@ seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

​​[Aura item]
5GuardianAngelRadiant_desc:
Once per combat: At @HealthThreshold@% Health and again at @HealthThreshold2@% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain %i:scaleAS% @AttackSpeed@% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
5RapidFirecannonRadiant_desc: Grant %i:scaleRange% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@HexRangeIncrease@</TFTRadiantItemBonus> bonus Attack Range and your attacks cannot miss.
5TitansResolveRadiant_desc:
Grant %i:scaleAD% @StackingAD*100@% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% @StackingSP@ Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to @StackCap@ times.

At full stacks, gain %i:scaleArmor% @BonusResistsAtStackCap@ Armor and %i:scaleMR% @BonusResistsAtStackCap@ Magic Resist.
5GiantSlayerRadiant_desc: Abilities and attacks deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@LargeBonusPct@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> more damage to enemies with more than @HealthThreshold@ maximum Health.
5BloodthirsterRadiant_desc:
Grant @Lifesteal@% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain a @ShieldHealthPercent@% maximum Health shield that lasts up to @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
5RabadonsDeathcapRadiant_desc: <tftitemrules>It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.</tftitemrules>
5JeweledGauntletRadiant_desc: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.
5GargoyleStoneplateRadiant_desc:
Grant %i:scaleArmor% @ArmorPerEnemy@ Armor and %i:scaleMR% @MRPerEnemy@ Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

Also, regenerate @MaxHealthRegen@% maximum Health each second.
5ChaliceOfPowerRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleAP% @ChaliceAP@ Ability Power and @Spellvamp@% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Aura item]
Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt
5InfinityEdgeRadiant_desc: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.
5DeathbladeRadiant_desc: <tftitemrules>It glows in the presence of enemies. Or friends. Or anything alive, really.</tftitemrules>
FrozenHeart_desc: Once per combat: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain a @ShieldHealthPercent@% maximum Health shield that lasts up to @ShieldDuration@ seconds and %i:scaleArmor% @Stats@ Armor and %i:scaleMR% @Stats@ Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

4OrnnEternalWinter_desc:
Enemies who damage the holder are @AttackSpeedSlowPercent@% Chilled for @SlowDuration@ seconds. After @NumApplications@ Chills from this item, the attacker is Stunned instead, but only once every @FreezeCooldown@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities
